title: What are the other subjects in BA philosophy hons. from DU? - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Arts Degrees in Philosophy with Honors

response.answer_text: Other subjects in BA philosophy as in? If you pursue BA from DU, you dont have to study other subjects. You'll have 4–5 papers on philosophy itself. Apart from that you'll have to choose an elective subject like english/pol science/evs etc. I was in BA Sociology and i had 4–5 papers like Indian Sociology, Political Sociology, Economic Sociology which are all part of the subject you chose as your honours subject. Also, you can go through Home | University of Delhi where you will find the syllabus for BA. Every paper you'll need in these 3 years has been mentioned there very clearly.
